mapper.select: SELECT SR_NO AS srNo, PRGRS_ID AS prgrsId, BGNG_YMD AS bgngYmd, END_YMD AS endYmd, PRGRS_RT AS prgrsRt FROM PROGRESS P WHERE P.SR_NO = #{srNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE PROGRESS SET BGNG_YMD = #{bgngYmd}, END_YMD = #{endYmd}, PRGRS_RT = #{prgrsRt} WHERE PRGRS_ID = #{prgrsId}
mapper.insert:
